body.name: Webcam with Ring Light Microphone - Streaming Web Camera, 1080P Full HD Pro Camera for PC Mac Laptop Desktop, USB Computer Webcam with Privacy Cover and Tripod for Zoom Meeting Skype Teams Twitch
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 28 mins
features: 【Three Level Adjustable Ring Light Webcam】: The 1080p FHD Webcam has a built-in light ring that offers lighting compensation at three different levels with touch control (high light-medium light-low light). With the soft lighting you can achieve your ideal light conditions by adjusting to the setting that is perfect for you, no need to worry about glare. It can help light up your scene even in dim light environments and make your video professional, beautiful, clear.

[ 1080P Full HD Webcam for Video Calling ]: The 90° wide angle lens captures true to life videos and images in 1080p (1920x1080) @ 30 fps. automatic low-light correction and auto white balance to make the picture quality really stand out. Perfect for Zoom / OBS / Twitch / Facebook / YouTube / Xbox one / Facetime / Video Calling / Conferencing / Gaming / Streaming / Recording / Online Teaching / Online Studying.

【Built-in Dual Noise Reduction Mics】ToLuLu webcam with microphone has built-in 2 noise-canceling mics to filter background noise and create clearer and more realistic effects, pick up your voice even at 12ft distance to make sure everyone hears the real you.ToLuLu Laptop Computer webcam protects you and communicates easily in any moment scene. (When installing the web camera, remember to select ToLuLu usb webcam as the default device for the microphones)

[360° PTZ Clip & Tripod & Privacy Cover ] This webcam features a 180° rotatable clip can be flexibly placed on computers, and the pc webcam has 360° swivel and 90° tilt functions to meet your various angle requirements.The flexible tripod bracket and 6ft long USB cable can place a webcam with ring light to provide a different and better experience for multi-person meetings or videos.The privacy cover not only protects your privacy security but also prevents the lens from dirt and debris.

[Plug and play, High Compatibility] : This stream webcam comes with a 6ft USB 2.0 cable connector, enables simple plug-and-play setup for Laptop/Desktop Mac, no additional drivers or download software required. and the setting is simple. The webcam with ring light is compatible with Windows, Android, Mac OS, Chrome OS, smart tv, and more;

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug and Play USB Webcam Simply plug the ring light webcam into the USB port of your laptop or desktop and it will be installed automatically. No extra drivers or additional software is required. You can immediately test and use the webcam in applications like Skype / Zoom. Widely Compatible The webcam is widely compatible with a host of different devices and software including Zoom, Skype, Facetime, OBS, Facebook Messenger, YouTube, Twitter, Whatsapp, Yahoo Video messenger, MSN, Android IPTV, etc. Webcam with Tripod Convenient to set up. Not only you can makes it easy to mount the streaming webcam on laptops or external monitors, you also can place the webcam on flat surface with the included tripod

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value and very well made product. True 1080 video and dual microphones that work superb!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to upgrade the one I bought last year that I though worked good. However the dual microphones on this model are super sensitive and voice recognition is insanely accurate even when I whisper. The wide view for video conferencing is amazing. The only thing I miss from my old model is the green light to show when the camera is active. The built-in ring light works like a touch lamp. It has 4 settings not 3 as described. OFF, low, medium, and high. I was worried the light would always stay on but that isn't the case. The swivel is a huge upgrade from my last camera. It also has 360 degrees of motion and can tilt left, right, up, down, and whatever angle you need to show other things in the room without lifting the camera off the the stand. Highly recommend this product as it is a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars have used this for a year now.
reviews.reviewText: i really enjoy this camera. all of my friends use cameras when chatting in discord or wherever and they pressured me into geting one, so i chose this one. easy to setup and the picture looks good for what it is. definitely recommend as a starter webcam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars why does it focus on the background but not on my face ? and it's so close without zooming in
reviews.reviewText: it's a great value, I just don't know why it doesn't focus on my face, and the background is clearer. I tried different apps, same issue. Any help would definitley be apprecaited.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent web cam
reviews.reviewText: The difference between this camera and my old one is remarkable. Radiant color, perfect focus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars great value webcam
reviews.reviewText: I needed a web cam quickly for a zoom call on a mac mini and this is the one I knew I could get quickly delivered. I haven't really played around with it too much as far as features go. as far as I know it does not have any type of features other than auto focus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a wide view Camera. The picture quality is excellent.
reviews.reviewText: I use for Zoom meetings Primarily. Its the Bomb!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because of the reviews despite not ever hearing the company's name before. Should have gone with my gut and bought from a brand I know. This thing is exactly what you pay for. 4K my butt. I'm a professional photographer and videographer, so I promise you I know what I'm talking about and this "webcam" is all wonky. The focal length is very odd. When you sit at a normal distance from your computer (15-20"), you are too cropped in the frame and out of focus. But what IS in focus is whatever is 2 feet behind you. Tried it in both Zoom and Teams and the quality is awful. Returning this immediately. Will it do if all you care about is someone seeing you out-of-focus on a video call? Yes. But if you get even slightly annoyed by out-of-focus video, this thing will drive you crazy. Don't buy this. You get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not have any focus functionality
reviews.reviewText: It's fine for a cheap camera. It is a fixed focus camera, however, so understand what that means. For me, this means I cannot use it to take proctored exams for online classes because it cannot focus on my ID to verify my identification. Anything that is closer than about 3 feet will be blurry. The fixed focus actually seems optimized for things even farther away, about 6+ feet. Not good for most web applications.
Not bad hard to focus on face and only says 3.7 MP not 8MP so thats false but its ok
Efectivamente la rapidez de entrega fue espectacular, buen producto a buen precio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Crisp Visuals for Enhanced Video Communication
reviews.reviewText: The ToLuLu 4K HD Webcam has proven to be a reliable companion for my video communication needs, offering impressive image quality and a range of features that enhance the overall experience. Here's a brief review:The most striking feature of the ToLuLu 4K HD Webcam is its crisp and clear visual output. The 4K resolution ensures that video calls are sharp and detailed, providing an enhanced level of clarity for both personal and professional use. The improved image quality is noticeable, making virtual interactions more engaging and lifelike.
Für meinen Einsatz als Arbeitsraumüberwachung im Laser ist sie top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the variable light options. Video quality is fine and it was easy to install and set up. The lid/cover was flimsy and couldn't be used.
